Leiden Open Variation Database (LOVD) Cleanup¶

These are the documentation pages for Andrew Hill’s project to clean up and validate variants from Leiden Open Variation Databases (LOVD) installations - a set of databases housing voluntarily curated mutations associated with specific disease areas as muscular dystrophy.

For more information on the LOVD platform see: - http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leiden_Open_Variation_Database - http://www.lovd.nl/3.0/home

For a list of all current LOVD installations see: - http://www.lovd.nl/2.0/index_list.php
